markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
# --description-- Next, give each `img` a `src` attribute according to its order in the document. The first `img` should have a `src` of `/images/1.jpg`. The rest should be the same, except replace the `1` with the number the `img` is in the document. # --hints-- All nine of your `img` elements should have a `src` attribute. ```js const images = [...document.querySelectorAll('img')]; assert(images.every(image => image.getAttribute('src'))); ``` Your first `img` element should have `/images/1.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[0]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/1.jpg'); ``` Your second `img` element should have `/images/2.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[1]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/2.jpg'); ``` Your third `img` element should have `/images/3.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[2]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/3.jpg'); ``` Your fourth `img` element should have `/images/4.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[3]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/4.jpg'); ``` Your fifth `img` element should have `/images/5.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[4]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/5.jpg'); ``` Your sixth `img` element should have `/images/6.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[5]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/6.jpg'); ``` Your seventh `img` element should have `/images/7.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[6]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/7.jpg'); ``` Your eighth `img` element should have `/images/8.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[7]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/8.jpg'); ``` Your ninth `img` element should have `/images/9.jpg` set as the `src` attribute value. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('img')?.[8]?.getAttribute('src') === '/images/9.jpg'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Photo Gallery

css flexbox photo gallery
